ValidationRule.description: Named List Accounts require validation status complete, named list date added, and named list added by values.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Named_List__c = TRUE, ISCHANGED( Named_List__c ), ISBLANK(TEXT(Named_List_Added_By__c)), ISBLANK(Named_List_Date__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In order to check this box, there must be a value for "Named List Added By", "Named List Date Added" and have a data validation status of "Validation Complete"
